basic.blooming: Flowering period October-February, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate light, in summer use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Fertilization not much required, dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply fertilizers once in each month in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
